eb874adf-1884-4576-91fd-0cc0fb54e58b.name: vSphere Clusters Performance
eb874adf-1884-4576-91fd-0cc0fb54e58b.description:
Part of Operationalize Your World.

Average of all cluster KPI from all clusters. This number should be stable, or its pattern follows your expectation, in a large environment. A large sudden drop is abnormal.

For details, see VCF Operations Transformation book and vSphere Metrics book, which are parts of Operationalize Your World.
